newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-AWA sees A$15 mln first half loss.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-AWA sees A$15 mln first half loss.

text.p: Gaming and communications company AWA Ltd said on Tuesday it expected a loss after abnormal items and taxation of about A$15 million in the half year to December 31.

The company said adverse factors in the first half consisted of operational losses in business about to be sold, which derived from major contract delays and cost overruns of some contracts, and abnormal losses from these businesses.

AWA said in the same announcement that it had reached a formal sales agreement with Plessey Corp Ltd of South Africa for the A$17.5 million sale of the rural communications, aerospace, and traffic businesses. AWA had a net profit of A$1.54 million in the 1995/96 first half from A$1.03 million a year earlier, but suffered a 55 percent fall in operating profit to A$3.45 million. -- Sydney Newsroom 61-2 9373-1800
